instruction.description: Making sure database is clean of temporary table
instruction.sql: SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 0;DROP TABLE IF EXISTS combine_jed_extensions

instruction.description: Create combination of UCM and JED_Extensions

instruction.sql: INSERT INTO combine_jed_extensions ( id, core_content_id, core_title, core_alias, core_body, core_state, core_created_user_id , core_created_time, core_catid, core_checked_out_time, core_checked_out_user_id, core_modified_user_id, core_modified_time, homepage_link, download_link, demo_link, support_link, documentation_link, license_link, versions, popular, requires_registration, type, related_free_paid_id, license, jed_note, update_url, update_url_ok, can_update, tags, language_code, video, version, uses_updater, includes, community_choice, score, approved, approved_time, extension_file, download_integration_type, download_integration_url, second_contact_email, currency, price, price_per, price_interval, language_body, backlink, non_gpl_css_js, parent_id, functionality, ease_of_use, support, documentation, value_for_money, num_reviews, jed_checked, extension_ext_libs ) SELECT e.id, core_content_id, core_title, core_alias, core_body, core_state, core_created_user_id , core_created_time, core_catid, core_checked_out_time, core_checked_out_user_id, core_modified_user_id, core_modified_time, homepage_link, download_link, demo_link, support_link, documentation_link, license_link, versions, popular, requires_registration, type, related_free_paid_id, license, jed_note, update_url, update_url_ok, can_update, tags, language_code, video, version, uses_updater, includes, community_choice, score, approved, approved_time, extension_file, download_integration_type, download_integration_url, second_contact_email, currency, price, price_per, price_interval, language_body, backlink, non_gpl_css_js, parent_id, functionality, ease_of_use, support, documentation, value_for_money, num_reviews, jed_checked, extension_ext_libs FROM wqyh6_jed_extensions e, wqyh6_ucm_content u WHERE u.core_content_item_id = e.id AND u.core_type_alias = "com_jed.extension" ORDER BY e.id ASC

UPDATE combine_jed_extensions cj, wqyh6_jed_extensions je SET cj.free_id = je.id, cj.free_homepage_link = je.homepage_link, cj.free_download_link = je.download_link, cj.free_demo_link = je.demo_link, cj.free_support_link = je.support_link, cj.free_documentation_link = je.documentation_link, cj.free_license_link = je.license_link, cj.free_versions = je.versions, cj.free_popular = je.popular, cj.free_requires_registration = je.requires_registration, cj.free_type = je.type, cj.free_related_free_paid_id = je.related_free_paid_id, cj.free_license = je.license, cj.free_jed_note = je.jed_note, cj.free_update_url = je.update_url, cj.free_update_url_ok = je.update_url_ok, cj.free_can_update = je.can_update, cj.free_tags = je.tags, cj.free_language_code = je.language_code, cj.free_video = je.video, cj.free_version = je.version, cj.free_uses_updater = je.uses_updater, cj.free_includes = je.includes, cj.free_community_choice = je.community_choice, cj.free_score = je.score, cj.free_approved = je.approved, cj.free_approved_time = je.approved_time, cj.free_extension_file = je.extension_file, cj.free_download_integration_type = je.download_integration_type, cj.free_download_integration_url = je.download_integration_url, cj.free_second_contact_email = je.second_contact_email, cj.free_currency = je.currency, cj.free_price = je.price, cj.free_price_per = je.price_per, cj.free_price_interval = je.price_interval, cj.free_language_body = je.language_body, cj.free_backlink = je.backlink, cj.free_non_gpl_css_js = je.non_gpl_css_js, cj.free_parent_id = je.parent_id, cj.free_functionality = je.functionality, cj.free_ease_of_use = je.ease_of_use, cj.free_support = je.support, cj.free_documentation = je.documentation, cj.free_value_for_money = je.value_for_money, cj.free_num_reviews = je.num_reviews, cj.free_jed_checked = je.jed_checked, cj.free_extension_ext_libs = je.extension_ext_libs WHERE je.type = "free" AND cj.type = "free" AND cj.id = je.id

UPDATE combine_jed_extensions cj, wqyh6_jed_extensions je SET cj.paid_id = je.id, cj.paid_homepage_link = je.homepage_link, cj.paid_download_link = je.download_link, cj.paid_demo_link = je.demo_link, cj.paid_support_link = je.support_link, cj.paid_documentation_link = je.documentation_link, cj.paid_license_link = je.license_link, cj.paid_versions = je.versions, cj.paid_popular = je.popular, cj.paid_requires_registration = je.requires_registration, cj.paid_type = je.type, cj.paid_related_free_paid_id = je.related_free_paid_id, cj.paid_license = je.license, cj.paid_jed_note = je.jed_note, cj.paid_update_url = je.update_url, cj.paid_update_url_ok = je.update_url_ok, cj.paid_can_update = je.can_update, cj.paid_tags = je.tags, cj.paid_language_code = je.language_code, cj.paid_video = je.video, cj.paid_version = je.version, cj.paid_uses_updater = je.uses_updater, cj.paid_includes = je.includes, cj.paid_community_choice = je.community_choice, cj.paid_score = je.score, cj.paid_approved = je.approved, cj.paid_approved_time = je.approved_time, cj.paid_extension_file = je.extension_file, cj.paid_download_integration_type = je.download_integration_type, cj.paid_download_integration_url = je.download_integration_url, cj.paid_second_contact_email = je.second_contact_email, cj.paid_currency = je.currency, cj.paid_price = je.price, cj.paid_price_per = je.price_per, cj.paid_price_interval = je.price_interval, cj.paid_language_body = je.language_body, cj.paid_backlink = je.backlink, cj.paid_non_gpl_css_js = je.non_gpl_css_js, cj.paid_parent_id = je.parent_id, cj.paid_functionality = je.functionality, cj.paid_ease_of_use = je.ease_of_use, cj.paid_support = je.support, cj.paid_documentation = je.documentation, cj.paid_value_for_money = je.value_for_money, cj.paid_num_reviews = je.num_reviews, cj.paid_jed_checked = je.jed_checked, cj.paid_extension_ext_libs = je.extension_ext_libs WHERE je.type = "paid" AND cj.type = "paid" AND cj.id = je.id
UPDATE combine_jed_extensions cj, wqyh6_jed_extension_logos jl SET cj.logo=jl.file WHERE jl.extension_id = cj.id
UPDATE combine_jed_extensions cj, wqyh6_jed_extension_logos jl SET cj.free_logo=jl.file WHERE jl.extension_id = cj.free_id
UPDATE combine_jed_extensions cj, wqyh6_jed_extension_logos jl SET cj.paid_logo=jl.file WHERE jl.extension_id = cj.paid_id

instruction.description: Arranging Master fields - Free or Paid
instruction.sql: UPDATE combine_jed_extensions cj, wqyh6_jed_extensions je SET cj.free_id = je.id, cj.free_homepage_link = je.homepage_link, cj.free_download_link = je.download_link, cj.free_demo_link = je.demo_link, cj.free_support_link = je.support_link, cj.free_documentation_link = je.documentation_link, cj.free_license_link = je.license_link, cj.free_versions = je.versions, cj.free_popular = je.popular, cj.free_requires_registration = je.requires_registration, cj.free_type = je.type, cj.free_related_free_paid_id = je.related_free_paid_id, cj.free_license = je.license, cj.free_jed_note = je.jed_note, cj.free_update_url = je.update_url, cj.free_update_url_ok = je.update_url_ok, cj.free_can_update = je.can_update, cj.free_tags = je.tags, cj.free_language_code = je.language_code, cj.free_video = je.video, cj.free_version = je.version, cj.free_uses_updater = je.uses_updater, cj.free_includes = je.includes, cj.free_community_choice = je.community_choice, cj.free_score = je.score, cj.free_approved = je.approved, cj.free_approved_time = je.approved_time, cj.free_extension_file = je.extension_file, cj.free_download_integration_type = je.download_integration_type, cj.free_download_integration_url = je.download_integration_url, cj.free_second_contact_email = je.second_contact_email, cj.free_currency = je.currency, cj.free_price = je.price, cj.free_price_per = je.price_per, cj.free_price_interval = je.price_interval, cj.free_language_body = je.language_body, cj.free_backlink = je.backlink, cj.free_non_gpl_css_js = je.non_gpl_css_js, cj.free_parent_id = je.parent_id, cj.free_functionality = je.functionality, cj.free_ease_of_use = je.ease_of_use, cj.free_support = je.support, cj.free_documentation = je.documentation, cj.free_value_for_money = je.value_for_money, cj.free_num_reviews = je.num_reviews, cj.free_jed_checked = je.jed_checked, cj.free_extension_ext_libs = je.extension_ext_libs WHERE je.id = cj.related_free_paid_id AND je.type = "free"

instruction.description: Arranging Master fields - Paid or Free
instruction.sql: UPDATE combine_jed_extensions cj, wqyh6_jed_extensions je SET cj.paid_id = je.id, cj.paid_homepage_link = je.homepage_link, cj.paid_download_link = je.download_link, cj.paid_demo_link = je.demo_link, cj.paid_support_link = je.support_link, cj.paid_documentation_link = je.documentation_link, cj.paid_license_link = je.license_link, cj.paid_versions = je.versions, cj.paid_popular = je.popular, cj.paid_requires_registration = je.requires_registration, cj.paid_type = je.type, cj.paid_related_free_paid_id = je.related_free_paid_id, cj.paid_license = je.license, cj.paid_jed_note = je.jed_note, cj.paid_update_url = je.update_url, cj.paid_update_url_ok = je.update_url_ok, cj.paid_can_update = je.can_update, cj.paid_tags = je.tags, cj.paid_language_code = je.language_code, cj.paid_video = je.video, cj.paid_version = je.version, cj.paid_uses_updater = je.uses_updater, cj.paid_includes = je.includes, cj.paid_community_choice = je.community_choice, cj.paid_score = je.score, cj.paid_approved = je.approved, cj.paid_approved_time = je.approved_time, cj.paid_extension_file = je.extension_file, cj.paid_download_integration_type = je.download_integration_type, cj.paid_download_integration_url = je.download_integration_url, cj.paid_second_contact_email = je.second_contact_email, cj.paid_currency = je.currency, cj.paid_price = je.price, cj.paid_price_per = je.price_per, cj.paid_price_interval = je.price_interval, cj.paid_language_body = je.language_body, cj.paid_backlink = je.backlink, cj.paid_non_gpl_css_js = je.non_gpl_css_js, cj.paid_parent_id = je.parent_id, cj.paid_functionality = je.functionality, cj.paid_ease_of_use = je.ease_of_use, cj.paid_support = je.support, cj.paid_documentation = je.documentation, cj.paid_value_for_money = je.value_for_money, cj.paid_num_reviews = je.num_reviews, cj.paid_jed_checked = je.jed_checked, cj.paid_extension_ext_libs = je.extension_ext_libs WHERE je.id = cj.related_free_paid_id AND je.type = "paid"

instruction.description: Arranging Master fields - which is the master row? Query 1
instruction.sql: ALTER TABLE combine_jed_extensions ADD COLUMN master_row TINYINT DEFAULT 0 AFTER paid_extension_ext_libs;UPDATE combine_jed_extensions SET master_row = 0

instruction.description: Arranging Master fields - which is the master row? Query 2
instruction.sql: UPDATE combine_jed_extensions SET master_row = 1 WHERE id = free_id AND paid_id = 0

instruction.description: Arranging Master fields - which is the master row? Query 3
instruction.sql: UPDATE combine_jed_extensions SET master_row = 1 WHERE id = paid_id AND free_id = 0

instruction.description: Arranging Master fields - which is the master row? Drop if Exists master_row table
instruction.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS master_rows

instruction.description: Arranging Master fields - which is the master row? Create master_row table
instruction.sql: CREATE TABLE master_rows SELECT id,free_id,paid_id FROM combine_jed_extensions WHERE master_row = 0 AND id = free_id AND free_id < paid_id

instruction.description: Arranging Master fields - which is the master row? Adding to master_row table
instruction.sql: INSERT INTO master_rows SELECT id,free_id,paid_id FROM combine_jed_extensions WHERE master_row = 0 AND id = paid_id AND paid_id < free_id

instruction.description: Arranging Master fields - Setting Master Rows
instruction.sql: UPDATE combine_jed_extensions SET master_row = 1 WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM master_rows)

instruction.description: Fixing Imported Data - Category constraint fails without this - extension 2393 has 0 category but this sets it to Miscellaneous
instruction.sql: UPDATE combine_jed_extensions SET core_catid=9 WHERE core_catid=0

instruction.description: Fixing Imported Data - Empty checked_out_time fields
instruction.sql: UPDATE combine_jed_extensions SET core_checked_out_time="0000-00-00 00:00:00" WHERE core_checked_out_time=""
DELETE FROM #__jed_extensions

INSERT INTO #__jed_extensions ( id, joomla_versions, popular, requires_registration, gpl_license_type, jed_internal_note, can_update, video, version, uses_updater, includes, approved, approved_time, second_contact_email, jed_checked, uses_third_party, primary_category_id, logo, published, created_by, modified_by, checked_out_time, created_on, modified_on, state ) SELECT id, versions, popular, requires_registration, license, jed_note, can_update, video, version, uses_updater, includes, approved, approved_time, second_contact_email, jed_checked, extension_ext_libs, core_catid, logo, core_state, core_created_user_id, core_modified_user_id, core_checked_out_time, core_created_time, core_modified_time, core_state FROM combine_jed_extensions WHERE master_row = 1
DELETE FROM #__jed_extension_varied_data

INSERT INTO #__jed_extension_varied_data ( id, extension_id, supply_option_id, title, alias, intro_text, description, homepage_link, download_link, demo_link, support_link, documentation_link, license_link, translation_link, tags, update_url, update_url_ok, download_integration_type, download_integration_url, logo, is_default_data, ordering, state, checked_out, checked_out_time, created_by ) SELECT 0, id AS 'extension_id', 1 AS 'supply_option_id', core_title, core_alias, '' AS 'intro_text', core_body AS 'description', homepage_link, download_link, demo_link, support_link, documentation_link, license_link, '' AS 'translation_link', tags, update_url, update_url_ok, download_integration_type, download_integration_url, logo, TRUE AS 'is_default_data', 0 AS 'ordering', core_state AS 'state', 0 AS 'checked_out', core_checked_out_time AS 'checked_out_time', core_created_user_id AS 'created_by' FROM combine_jed_extensions WHERE type = 'free' AND master_row = 1

INSERT INTO #__jed_extension_varied_data ( id, extension_id, supply_option_id, title, alias, intro_text, description, homepage_link, download_link, demo_link, support_link, documentation_link, license_link, translation_link, tags, update_url, update_url_ok, download_integration_type, download_integration_url, logo, is_default_data, ordering, state, checked_out, checked_out_time, created_by ) SELECT 0, id AS 'extension_id', 2 AS 'supply_option_id', core_title, core_alias, '' AS 'intro_text', core_body AS 'description', homepage_link, download_link, demo_link, support_link, documentation_link, license_link, '' AS 'translation_link', tags, update_url, update_url_ok, download_integration_type, download_integration_url, logo, TRUE AS 'is_default_data', 0 AS 'ordering', core_state AS 'state', 0 AS 'checked_out', core_checked_out_time AS 'checked_out_time', core_created_user_id AS 'created_by' FROM combine_jed_extensions WHERE type = 'paid' AND master_row = 1

INSERT INTO #__jed_extension_varied_data ( id, extension_id, supply_option_id, title, alias, intro_text, description, homepage_link, download_link, demo_link, support_link, documentation_link, license_link, translation_link, tags, update_url, update_url_ok, download_integration_type, download_integration_url, logo, is_default_data, ordering, state, checked_out, checked_out_time, created_by ) SELECT 0, id AS 'extension_id', 1 AS 'supply_option_id', core_title, core_alias, '' AS 'intro_text', core_body AS 'description', free_homepage_link, free_download_link, free_demo_link, free_support_link, free_documentation_link, free_license_link, '' AS 'translation_link', free_tags, free_update_url, free_update_url_ok, free_download_integration_type, free_download_integration_url, free_logo, TRUE AS 'is_default_data', 0, core_state AS 'state', 0 AS 'checked_out', core_checked_out_time AS 'checked_out_time', core_created_user_id AS 'created_by' FROM combine_jed_extensions WHERE type = 'paid' AND master_row = 1 AND free_id <> 0

INSERT INTO #__jed_extension_varied_data ( id,extension_id, supply_option_id, title, alias, intro_text, description, homepage_link, download_link, demo_link, support_link, documentation_link, license_link, translation_link, tags, update_url, update_url_ok, download_integration_type, download_integration_url, logo, is_default_data, ordering, state, checked_out, checked_out_time, created_by ) SELECT 0, id AS 'extension_id', 2 AS 'supply_option_id', core_title, core_alias, '' AS 'intro_text', core_body AS 'description', paid_homepage_link, paid_download_link, paid_demo_link, paid_support_link, paid_documentation_link, paid_license_link, '' AS 'translation_link', paid_tags, paid_update_url, paid_update_url_ok, paid_download_integration_type, paid_download_integration_url, paid_logo, TRUE AS 'is_default_data', 0, core_state AS 'state', 0 AS 'checked_out', core_checked_out_time AS 'checked_out_time', core_created_user_id AS 'created_by' FROM combine_jed_extensions WHERE type='free' AND master_row=1 AND paid_id <> 0
DELETE FROM #__jed_extension_scores

INSERT INTO #__jed_extension_scores ( id, extension_id, supply_option_id, functionality_score, ease_of_use_score, support_score, value_for_money_score, documentation_score, number_of_reviews) SELECT 0, id, 1, free_functionality, free_ease_of_use, free_support, free_value_for_money, free_documentation, free_num_reviews FROM combine_jed_extensions WHERE master_row = 1 AND free_id <> 0

INSERT INTO #__jed_extension_scores ( id, extension_id, supply_option_id, functionality_score, ease_of_use_score, support_score, value_for_money_score, documentation_score, number_of_reviews ) SELECT 0, id, 2, paid_functionality, paid_ease_of_use, paid_support, paid_value_for_money, paid_documentation, paid_num_reviews FROM combine_jed_extensions WHERE master_row = 1 AND paid_id <> 0
DELETE FROM #__jed_extension_images

INSERT INTO #__jed_extension_images ( id, extension_id, supply_option_id, filename, created_by ) SELECT 0, cj.id, 1, jei.filename, created_by FROM combine_jed_extensions cj, wqyh6_jed_extensions_images jei WHERE cj.master_row = 1 AND cj.free_id <> 0 AND jei.extension_id = cj.free_id

INSERT INTO #__jed_extension_images (id,extension_id,supply_option_id, filename,created_by) SELECT 0,cj.id,2 ,jei.filename,created_by FROM combine_jed_extensions cj, wqyh6_jed_extensions_images jei WHERE cj.master_row=1 AND cj.paid_id <> 0 AND jei.extension_id = cj.paid_id

instruction.description: Making sure database is clean of temporary table
instruction.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS combine_jed_reviews

instruction.description: Create combination of UCM and JED_Extensions
instruction.sql: CREATE TABLE combine_jed_reviews AS SELECT ucm.*,jr.* FROM wqyh6_ucm_content ucm, wqyh6_jed_reviews jr WHERE core_type_alias="com_jed.review" AND jr.id = core_content_item_id
DELETE FROM #__jed_reviews

INSERT INTO #__jed_reviews ( id, extension_id, supply_option_id, title, alias, body, functionality, functionality_comment, ease_of_use, ease_of_use_comment, support, support_comment, documentation, documentation_comment, value_for_money, value_for_money_comment, overall_score, used_for, version,flagged, ip_address, published, created_on, created_by, ordering) SELECT 0, cj.id, 1, cr.core_title, cr.core_alias, cr.core_body, cr.functionality, '', cr.ease_of_use, '', cr.support, '', cr.documentation, '', cr.value_for_money, '', ( cr.functionality+ cr.ease_of_use + cr.support + cr.documentation + cr.value_for_money) AS 'overall_score', used_for, cr.version, flagged,ip_address, cr.core_state, cr.core_created_time, cr.core_created_user_id, 0 FROM combine_jed_reviews cr, combine_jed_extensions cj WHERE cj.master_row=1 AND cj.free_id <> 0 AND cr.extension_id = cj.free_id ORDER BY cj.id, cr.core_created_time ASC

INSERT INTO #__jed_reviews ( id, extension_id, supply_option_id, title, alias, body, functionality, functionality_comment, ease_of_use, ease_of_use_comment, support, support_comment, documentation, documentation_comment, value_for_money, value_for_money_comment, overall_score, used_for, version,flagged, ip_address, published, created_on, created_by, ordering) SELECT 0, cj.id, 2, cr.core_title, cr.core_alias, cr.core_body, cr.functionality, '', cr.ease_of_use, '', cr.support, '', cr.documentation, '', cr.value_for_money, '', ( cr.functionality+ cr.ease_of_use + cr.support + cr.documentation + cr.value_for_money) AS 'overall_score', used_for, cr.version, flagged,ip_address, cr.core_state, cr.core_created_time, cr.core_created_user_id, 0 FROM combine_jed_reviews cr, combine_jed_extensions cj WHERE cj.master_row=1 AND cj.paid_id <> 0 AND cr.extension_id = cj.paid_id ORDER BY cj.id, cr.core_created_time ASC

task.heading: Convert JED3 RSForms into individual tables

instruction.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS old_rsform5;DROP TABLE IF EXISTS old_rsform7;DROP TABLE IF EXISTS old_rsform9;DROP TABLE IF EXISTS old_rsform10;DROP TABLE IF EXISTS old_rsform11;DROP TABLE IF EXISTS old_rsform12;DROP TABLE IF EXISTS old_rsform13;DROP TABLE IF EXISTS old_rsform14

instruction.description: Create structures to hold each form type
Grab Submission Id info from submissions
Convert RSForm rows of data into columns
Clean local categories and move JED3 categories over.
instruction.sql: DELETE FROM #__categories where extension='com_jed';insert into #__categories select * from wqyh6_categories where extension='com_jed'

instruction.description: Create JED_Developers table from JED 3 data
instruction.sql: DELETE FROM #__jed_developers;insert into #__jed_developers select * from wqyh6_jed_users

instruction.description: Clean local users and move JED3 users over. NOTE - NEED TO MANUALLY DO USERGROUP_MAP
instruction.sql: DELETE FROM #__users where id >16;DELETE FROM #__users WHERE id=1; insert into #__users ( `id`, `name`, `username`, `email`, `password`, `block`, `sendEmail`, `registerDate`, `lastvisitDate`, `activation`, `params`, `lastResetTime`, `resetCount`, `otpKey`, `otep`, `requireReset`) select `id`, `name`, `username`, `email`, `password`, `block`, `sendEmail`, `registerDate`, `lastvisitDate`, `activation`, `params`, `lastResetTime`, `resetCount`, `otpKey`, `otep`, `requireReset` from wqyh6_users;SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 1
